Container.Name: Nginx-Proxy-Manager-Official
Container.Overview:
Nginx Proxy Manager enables you to easily forward to your websites running at home or otherwise, including free SSL, without having to know too much about Nginx or Letsencrypt.
|------------------------------------------------- | Default Administrator User |------------------------------------------------- Immediately after logging in with this default user you will be asked to modify your details and change your password.
Email: admin@example.com Password: changeme
|------------------------------------------------- | Add any other Stream Port |------------------------------------------------- You can also add any other Stream port you want to expose.
'21:21' # FTP
|------------------------------------------------- | Using MySQL / MariaDB Database |------------------------------------------------- If you opt for the MySQL configuration you will have to provide the database server yourself. Remove the "DB_SQLITE_FILE" variable and add the following variabels with the right values instead.
Mysql/Maria connection parameters: DB_MYSQL_HOST: "db" DB_MYSQL_PORT: 3306 DB_MYSQL_USER: "npm" DB_MYSQL_PASSWORD: "npm" DB_MYSQL_NAME: "npm"
Container.Category: Tools:Utilities Other: Network:Web Network:Proxy Network:Management Network:Other
Container.DonateText: If you like my work and would like to support me please consider Donating.

Config.Name: DISABLE_IPV6
Config.Description: Set to true if you donÂ´t use IPv6

Config.Name: Database
Config.Description: Set the location of the SQLite DB file within the container!

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: UID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: UMASK for newly created files. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.
